message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.LG

This paper focuses on the task of Automatic Live Video Commenting (ALVC), which involves generating real-time video comments based on both video frames and textual inputs. This task involves complex dependencies between video and text, which suggests that the paper may belong to the natural language processing (NLP) or computer vision (CV) sub-categories. Additionally, the use of attention mechanisms and metric learning suggests that the paper may belong to the machine learning (ML) or information retrieval (IR) sub-categories. Finally, the focus on real-time commenting suggests that the paper may belong to the multimedia (MM) sub-category. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.IR, and cs.LG, in that order.
